__e: Every time I hear that, something terrible happens.
-Of course, I hear that all the time.
I don't know nothing. I don't see nothing. I don't hear nothing.
You know, I have not heard anything in 6 months.
When I listen to you, you who are so young among your own kind, I realise that we Sensorites have a lot to learn from the people of Earth.
I listen to you, and I watch your face, and I know what you're saying, but your eyes keep me from believing it.
Your foot against mine in bed I listen to you breathe. I'll make a ﬁlm to feed our son and us.
That's the first time I heard your name.
You think I listen to what you say?
I will listen to anything, but could we do it someplace else?
